description: Developed and maintained features using Next.js, Supabase, PostgreSQL, and ShadCN UI.

projects.name: Podcas
projects.description: Podcas simplifies podcast creation by using AI technology, enabling users to quickly turn ideas into fully produced episodes in minutes
responsibilities: Optimized the podcast audio regeneration to enhance efficiency and save resources.
Worked on the responsiveness of the website to improve user experience.
Added functionalities where users can edit video styles for generated podcasts.

description: Developed and maintained features using C# and MVVM architecture using Avalonia and Telerik UI.

projects.name: HOLOS-IE
